replies.body: Because brand is the only champ who doesnt suck ballz vs the doombots obviously
He had like an 80% winrate against the bots, it was too strong and made things too easy.

> [{quoted}](name=Glow,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=hfaY24dh,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-22T18:25:30.789+0000)
>
> He had like an 80% winrate against the bots, it was too strong and made things too easy.

This obviously.. they dont want to ruin their entire game mode because one word gets around then literally every game there will be a brand making it a cakewalk. that would not be good game design so the easiest way is to disable him. its the right choice, get over it.

It's a complete and utter cop-out. This is a game mode that is versus bots, we should have a *full and complete, unaltered* roster of champions available to us, but because Riot are cheap c*nts they decided that Brand, as he is in live, is "too powerful".

F*ck you Rito, seriously.
I find it really unfair that you cant play brand against them, but you can vs a brand bot, like wtf?
